replies.body: Makes sense, with Swip3rR stepping up, Chiefs are in a massive struggle for resource allocation, Raydere as a highly experienced ADC likely prefers a greater share of the resources that is simply too hard to accommodate with so many players needing the resources on Chiefs

raydere is the best adc ever in oce there is no question that the chiefs have traded down at least in the short term. in regards to the matchup i havnt watched enough of dire wolves to really comment but if general trends carry over and if the chiefs as a whole are a better team than the dire wolves, then they will win because an adc cant carry a game on his own.

As a CHF fan I am actually pretty happy about this. I think Raydere's time has come and gone. I see a lot of very good ADC's tearing apart teams and I don't think Raydere is really on the same level. That being said, it will be interesting to see how the new ADC fits into the CHF's as a team. Hope everything works out and they win finals! ;) ♥
I think the legatree will have something to say about this.
